All Implemented Interfaces:
de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.EntityRenderedListener, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.EntityRenderListener, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.ICollisionEntity, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.ICombatEntity, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.IEntity, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.tweening.Tweenable, EventListener
public class Lasers extends Punishment
Represents a laser-based punishment hazard that disappears once its associated Button is pressed. Lasers attach their button on the first update tick and remove themselves from the environment when disabled.

    • getPunishmentType

      public PunishmentType getPunishmentType()
      Returns the punishment type for lasers.
      Specified by:
      getPunishmentType in class Punishment
      Returns:
      PunishmentType.LASER

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the laser hazard each tick. On first update, attaches the corresponding button. When the button is pressed, the lasers remove themselves from the environment.
      Specified by:
      update in interface de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable
      Specified by:
      update in class Punishment
